titleStmt.title: A discovery of the new creation. In a sermon preached at the head-quarters at Putney Sept. 29. 1647. By Thomas Collier.
titleStmt.author: Collier, Thomas, fl. 1691.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Giles Calvert, and are to be sold at the Black-spred-Eagle at the west-end of Pauls,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the Black-spred-Eagle at the west-end of Pauls
